%%sql 

MERGE INTO crm_sanctioneddb.fact_opportunity AS target
USING (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        O.Opportunity_id_nk,
        O.Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        P.Practice_id_nk,
        O.Primary_Practice AS Primary_Practice_Short_Name,
        O.Solicitation_Short_Name,
        cal.CalendarDate,
        O.Stage,
        geo.Geography_id_nk,
        COALESCE(O.Estimated_Value, 0.0) AS Estimated_Value,
        COALESCE(O.IQC_Ceiling, 0.0) AS IQC_Ceiling,
        O.Award_Date,
        O.IsActive, -- This ensures all incoming records are marked active
        current_date() AS Effective_start_date,
        '9999-12-31' AS Effective_end_date,
        current_date() AS Date_Created,
        current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
        current_user() AS Created_By,
        current_user() AS Updated_By
    FROM crm_sanctioneddb.dim_opportunity O
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_businessunit BU ON BU.Business_Unit_Id_nk = O.Business_Unit_Id_nk AND BU.IsActive = 1
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_new_practice P ON P.practice = O.primary_practice AND P.IsActive = 1
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_calendar cal ON cal.CalendarDate = CAST(O.Effective_Start_Date AS DATE)
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_geography geo ON geo.Geography_id_nk = O.Primary_Location_Country_Key AND geo.IsActive = 1
    WHERE O.IsActive = 1
) AS source
ON target.Opportunity_id_nk = source.Opportunity_id_nk
WHEN MATCHED AND target.IsActive = 1 THEN -- Only update active records
    UPDATE SET
        IsActive = 0,
        Effective_end_date = current_date()
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        Opportunity_id_nk,
        Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        Practice_id_nk,
        Primary_Practice_Short_Name,
        Solicitation_Short_Name,
        CalendarDate,
        Stage,
        Geography_id_nk,
        Estimated_Value,
        IQC_Ceiling,
        Award_Date,
        IsActive,
        Effective_start_date,
        Effective_end_date,
        Date_Created,
        Date_Updated_Last,
        Created_By,
        Updated_By
    )
    VALUES (
        source.Opportunity_id_nk,
        source.Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        source.Practice_id_nk,
        source.Primary_Practice_Short_Name,
        source.Solicitation_Short_Name,
        source.CalendarDate,
        source.Stage,
        source.Geography_id_nk,
        source.Estimated_Value,
        source.IQC_Ceiling,
        source.Award_Date,
        source.IsActive,
        source.Effective_start_date,
        source.Effective_end_date,
        source.Date_Created,
        source.Date_Updated_Last,
        source.Created_By,
        source.Updated_By
    );
